    • Method Detail

      • bound

        protected int bound(AbstractWaypoint lastSeenNode,
                    java.util.ArrayList<AbstractWaypoint> unseen,
                    java.util.Map<AbstractWaypoint,java.util.Map<AbstractWaypoint,java.lang.Integer>> costs,
                    java.util.Map<AbstractWaypoint,java.lang.Integer> deliveryDurations,
                    int seenCost)
        Bound using the sum of min cost per unseen node (including warehouse) plus the cost of the node. Complexity: O(nÂ²) with n the number of unseen node. Min cost is defined as average of the two min cost (with only one cost per linked node, i.e. the to min cost can't link the two same points, as we know that the next node can't be the same the previous) A one day malus is added by point that cannot be reached on time.
        Overrides:
        bound in class TspSolver
        Parameters:
        lastSeenNode - the last explored node.
        unseen - all nodes not explored yet.
        seenCost - the cost of all explored nodes.
        costs - the cost of the path between each node.
        deliveryDurations - the delivery duration of each node.
        Returns:
        a min bound of the cost to see each unseen node
